notes: Steps for ending each round and attaching a new color (ss + ch 1) are explained in the YouTube tutorial.
Highly recommended to watch the full video to understand how the pattern is worked.
There are no mistakes in this pattern; read instructions carefully.

rounds.1: Slipknot, ch 8, dc into 3rd ch from hook, 1 dc, 3 dc x 2, 1 dc, 4 dc, work on other side of ch, in same stitch as previous 4 dc – 3 dc (total 7 dc), dc 4, 6 dc, end round and attach next color (ss + ch 1).
rounds.2: 2 hdc in same stitch as ss, 1 hdc x 4, 3 dc, 1 hdc x 4, 2 hdc x 2, 3 hdc x 2, 2 hdc, 1 sc, sc 2 together, 1 sc, 2 hdc, 3 hdc x 2, 2 hdc, end round and attach next color.
rounds.3: 1 hdc x 7, 2 dc x 2, 1 hdc x 8, 2 hdc x 6, 1 sc x 2, sc 4 together, 1 sc x 2, 2 hdc x 6, 1 hdc, end and attach next color.
rounds.4: 1 hdc x 9, 3 dc, 1 hdc x 12, (2 hdc, 1 hdc) x 4, 2 sc, 1 sc x 2, sc 2 together, 1 sc x 2, 2 sc, (1 hdc, 2 hdc) x 4, 1 hdc x 3, end and attach new color.
rounds.5: 1 hdc x 10, 2 dc x 2, 1 hdc x 13, (2 hdc, 1 hdc x 2) x 4, 2 sc, 1 sc, sc 4 together, 1 sc, 2 sc, (1 hdc x 2, 2 hdc) x 4, 1 hdc x 3.
rounds.6: 1 hdc x 12, 3 dc, 1 hdc x 15, (2 hdc, 1 hdc x 3) x 4, 2 sc, sc x 2, sc 2 together, sc x 2, 2 sc, (1 hdc x 3, 2 hdc) x 4, 1 hdc.
rounds.7: 1 hdc x 13, 2 dc x 2, 1 hdc x 13, (2 hdc, 1 hdc x 4) x 4, 2 sc, sc x 2, sc 4 together, sc x 2, 2 sc, (1 hdc x 4, 2 hdc) x 4, 1 hdc x 2.
rounds.8: 1 hdc x 15, 3 dc, 1 hdc x 16, (2 hdc, 1 hdc x 5) x 4, 2 sc, sc x 2, sc 2 together, sc x 2, 2 sc, (1 hdc x 5, 2 hdc) x 4, 1 hdc.
rounds.9: 1 hdc x 16, 2 dc x 2, 1 hdc x 17, (2 hdc, 1 hdc x 6) x 4, 2 sc, sc x 2, sc 2 together, sc x 2, 2 sc, (1 hdc x 6, 2 hdc) x 4, 1 hdc.
rounds.10: 1 hdc x 18, 3 dc, 1 hdc x 19, (2 hdc, 1 hdc x 7) x 4, 2 sc, sc x 2, sc 2 together, sc x 2, 2 sc, (1 hdc x 7, 2 hdc) x 4, 1 hdc.
rounds.11: 1 hdc x 19, 2 dc x 2, 1 hdc x 20, (2 hdc, 1 hdc x 8) x 4, 2 sc, sc x 2, sc 2 together, sc x 2, 2 sc, (1 hdc x 8, 2 hdc) x 4, 1 hdc.
rounds.12: 1 hdc x 21, 3 dc, 1 hdc x 22, (2 hdc, 1 hdc x 9) x 4, 2 sc, sc x 2, sc 2 together, sc x 2, 2 sc, (1 hdc x 9, 2 hdc) x 4, 1 hdc.

cushion.instructions_after_round_12: You may continue increasing rounds similarly to make it bigger.

abbreviations.fake_magic_ring: slip knot, ch 3, ss in 1st ch, ch 1, work stitches in circle

legs.join: ss & fasten off first leg, repeat second, ss to join (10 stitches total)

rows: Row 1: increase, ch 5, sc in chsp (6 mesh)
Row 33: chain 135 → sc in 9th ch → repeat mesh pattern → join to panel
Row 34: ch 5, sc in all chsp including ties

sleeves.note: Sew front & back panels first, leave armhole space.
